about_the_game:
§ See 20 Seconds Into the Future

  • Battles from the adventurer's perspective are displayed in increments of 「1 second (unit)」 to reveal every move the monster makes. On the timeline, visualized as a serpentine path, you can clearly foresee the next 「20 seconds」 and use this to plan actions for 「defense」 or 「attack」. Weapons of different weights have unique swing times. If your attack overlaps with a monster’s action on the timeline, not only will you maintain the initiative, but you might also trigger unexpected effects.

§ What’s a Good Weapon Without Enchantments and Refinement?

  • Beyond forging the base materials, we are legendary blacksmiths, masters of both refinement and enchantment. By gathering various materials from monsters, you can imbue your weapons with unique magical inscriptions and refine them to craft the perfect weapon of your dreams.

§ Create Your Own Arsenal of Weapons

  • At the beginning, you are just a novice adventurer wielding a mass-produced weapon. Simple attacks and defenses are enough to handle early challenges, but as enemies become more cunning and deadly, your choices will determine your future fate. Will you forge a fiery arsenal of blazing greatswords for an explosive fury build? Or craft impenetrable shields of ice, becoming an unstoppable shield tank? Every weapon you forge is a testament to your strength and the beginning of your enemies’ nightmares.

§ Ever Thought a Humble Weapon Could Deliver a Lethal Blow?

  • In Path of the Forge: Blacksmith's Saga, the power of a weapon is defined by you. A simple 「Electric Daggers」 at the start might, through clever equipment synergy, transform into a 「Lightning-speed Blade Strike」 capable of obliterating enemies. Or, by stacking defensive modifiers, you could turn your character into a perpetual-motion tank that enemies can’t touch. Your weapon combinations aren’t set in stone—they evolve with your strategies and decisions. No two adventures will be the same, but each will be unforgettable.

§ Interaction Between Elemental Attributes

  • Every weapon and monster has its own elemental attribute, providing bonus damage or resistance effects. But have you ever wondered what happens if you use a water-based attack on a burning goblin, extinguishing its roaring flames? Or when a mischievous sea anemone unleashes an electrified tentacle on a soaking wet adventurer, causing a shocking result? Elemental effects and environmental interactions may lead to subtle yet fascinating outcomes, adding depth to combat.

§ The Endless Path of Forging

  • In this world, strategy is power. Every weapon in an adventurer's hands is a future possibility. Through countless builds and experiments, even the most unassuming weapon can become a legend, turning hopeless situations into victories. This isn’t just a game—it’s the ultimate test of your intellect and creativity. Grip your hammer tightly, embark on the path of forging, and become a legendary blacksmith!

name: Path of Gear: Blacksmith's Legend

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: “Path of Gear: Blacksmith's Legend” is a deck-building roguelike where you play as a blacksmith, crafting unique weapons from materials found in battles, events, and the environment. Each run offers new weapon builds and playstyles to face monsters.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
